DOC.brief_summary: This is an open label, single-center study of the pharmacokinetic and safety profile of repeat doses of PMI-150 (intranasal ketamine) 30 mg in healthy adult volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Pharmacokinetics of Intranasal Ketamine
DOC.detailed_description: To examine safety and characterize the repeat dosing plasma profile, effect on absorption, and accumulation following repeated administration of 30 mg doses of PMI-150 (intranasal ketamine) to healthy adult volunteers.
